#NTiled

A library for working with Tiled 0.91 maps (tmx).

##NuGet

```
PM> Install-Package NTiled
```

##NuGet Dependencies
ICSharpCode.SharpZipLib, Version=0.86.0.518

##Road map

* Terrain support.
* Writing Tiled maps.
* Error checking and validation.
* Helper library for processing maps.
* Refined object model.
